description: Stylesheet for the interactive tic-tac-toe platform, defining styles for light and dark themes, various app components, and responsive design features.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with centralized text alignment and theme-based background color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application styled for aesthetic alignment and color transition on theme change.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling using theme-based colors, including transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling themes with responsive design and hover effects.
